019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import java.util.Collection;
022import java.util.Collections;
023import java.util.HashSet;
024import java.util.List;
025import java.util.Set;
026import java.util.function.Function;
027import java.util.stream.Collectors;
028import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.VmDefinition.Grant;
029import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.VmDefinition.Permission;
030import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.DataPath;
031
032/**
033 * Represents a VM pool.
034 */
035@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataClass" })
036public class VmPool {
037
038    private String name;
039    private boolean defined;
040    private List<Grant> permissions = Collections.emptyList();
041    private final Set<String> vms
042        = Collections.synchronizedSet(new HashSet<>());
043
044    /**
045     * Instantiates a new vm pool.
046     *
047     * @param name the name
048     */
049    public VmPool(String name) {
050        this.name = name;
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * Returns the name.
055     *
056     * @return the name
057     */
058    public String name() {
059        return name;
060    }
061
062    /**
063     * Sets the name.
064     *
065     * @param name the name to set
066     */
067    public void setName(String name) {
068        this.name = name;
069    }
070
071    /**
072     * Checks if is defined.
073     *
074     * @return the result
075     */
076    public boolean isDefined() {
077        return defined;
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * Sets if is.
082     *
083     * @param defined the defined to set
084     */
085    public void setDefined(boolean defined) {
086        this.defined = defined;
087    }
088
089    /**
090     * Permissions granted for a VM from the pool.
091     *
092     * @return the permissions
093     */
094    public List<Grant> permissions() {
095        return permissions;
096    }
097
098    /**
099     * Sets the permissions.
100     *
101     * @param permissions the permissions to set
102     */
103    public void setPermissions(List<Grant> permissions) {
104        this.permissions = permissions;
105    }
106
107    /**
108     * Returns the VM names.
109     *
110     * @return the vms
111     */
112    public Set<String> vms() {
113        return vms;
114    }
115
116    @Override
117    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition")
118    public String toString() {
119        StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder(50);
120        builder.append("VmPool [name=").append(name).append(", permissions=")
121            .append(permissions).append(", vms=");
122        if (vms.size() <= 3) {
123            builder.append(vms);
124        } else {
125            builder.append('[').append(vms.stream().limit(3).map(s -> s + ",")
126                .collect(Collectors.joining())).append("...]");
127        }
128        builder.append(']');
129        return builder.toString();
130    }
131
132    /**
133     * Collect all permissions for the given user with the given roles.
134     *
135     * @param user the user
136     * @param roles the roles
137     * @return the sets the
138     */
139    public Set<Permission> permissionsFor(String user,
140            Collection<String> roles) {
141        return permissions.stream()
142            .filter(g -> DataPath.get(g, "user").map(u -> u.equals(user))
143                .orElse(false)
144                || DataPath.get(g, "role").map(roles::contains).orElse(false))
145            .map(g -> DataPath.<Set<Permission>> get(g, "may")
146                .orElse(Collections.emptySet()).stream())
147            .flatMap(Function.identity()).collect(Collectors.toSet());
148    }
149
150}
